channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Enterprise IT’s Inflection Point: How IT And IoT Are Shaping A New Era
item.description: The responsibilities that have defined IT’s estate and its core responsibilities for decades are increasingly untenable using traditional approaches a...

item.title: Galaxy’s Oldest Known Naked Eye Star Can Be Seen From A Dark Backyard
item.description: The oldest naked eye star yet found still provides stellar theorists with key data on the earliest epochs of our Milky Way.

item.title: Elon Musk Wants To Raise The Birth Rate. He’s Cutting Medical Care For Mothers And Babies.
item.description: Elon Musk has long claimed civilization will collapse unless we raise the birth rate. Meanwhile, his “DOGE” group is slashing billions in funding for ...

item.title: Why SaaS Identity Attacks Work And How To Stop Them
item.description: As enterprises continue to adopt SaaS applications at an exponential pace, identities—both human and nonhuman—will remain the linchpin of security.

item.title: Agentic AI Is The Next Frontier Of B2B Innovation
item.description: I’m convinced agentic AI will have a breakout moment in 2025—the kind that will reverberate for years to come. Here’s why.
